title: PU seminar on Kashmir on Wednesday
content:
LAHORE, Feb 23 (APP):The Punjab University (PU) Institute of Communication Studies (ICS) will organise a seminar on “Indian State Terrorism against unarmed Kashmiris:
The Response of World Community and Media” at 11am at Al Razi Hall on Wednesday.
Azad Jammu & Kashmir President Sardar Masood Ahmad Khan will be the chief guest.
PU Vice Chancellor Prof Dr Niaz Ahmad Akhtar, Pro Vice-Chancellor Prof Dr Muhammad Saleem Mazhar, Senior Journalist Dr Mujahid Ali Mansoori, Mujeeb-ur-Rehman Shami, Salman Ghani, SM Zafar, Dean Faculty of Social Sciences Prof Dr Umbreen Javaid and Director Institute of Communication Studies Prof Dr Noshina Saleem will address the seminar.
